data.title: PM Group new office in Brussels, Belgium
data.meta_description: PM Group announce the opening of a new office in Brussels. Created in response to client demand, the new office will focus on innovative design solutions for clients in Belgium’s Wallonia region.
data.text:
“We are delighted to open our new office in Brussels adding to our well established team in Antwerp. The Brussels office is a key part of our strategy to grow our operations and expand our reach in Belgium. Our team is now over 125 people and the new office will support future growth,” said Kieran Lane, Operations Manager Belgium.

PM Group has been established in Belgium for 17 years and is currently managing projects to the value of €250+million. Key clients include GSK, Takeda, J&J and Sanofi.

The opening of the Brussels office brings to 18 the number of offices in the company’s international network. Elsewhere in Europe, PM Group has offices in Germany, Ireland and Poland and is working on major projects in the Netherlands and Denmark. It also has significant operations in Asia, the UK and US.

“This is a very exciting time for us. The Brussels office is a testament to our team’s dedication to growing the business and responding to our clients’ needs. The new office has been designed to create a great working environment for our people. It provides us with better access to talent in the Wallonia region where we are currently recruiting for over 20 roles. These include project and construction management, architecture and building services,” said Else Boriau, Talent Acquisition Specialist, PM Group.

Interested in joining PM Group?
